Each account includes:


How could you I get the server access data to test VPS with Natcoweb?

To get server access data, please register VPS that meets your requirements and submit a ticket via help desk, specifying “VPS Test Drive” Let us know how you will be using vps, we need to make sure your projects are in compliance with Natcoweb AUP . Free trial period is available for 3-5 days.




What OS can be used inside virtual machines?

Debian and Centos Linux OS

What control panels does Natcoweb offer to VPS hosting clients?

Cpanel and Dedikit™


What's the average ticket response time?

About 10-15 minutes.

What virtualization technology is used for Natcoweb VPS services?

We provide KVM-based VPS . With KVM virtualization technology you can access your Linux VPS console in a physical-like way. RAM and disk are not shared with other virtual machines on the main server. This makes your KVM-based VPS server even more stable and excludes the possibility of overselling. KVM supports all hardware virtualization features of new Intel processors and chipsets. KVM allows to choose custom kernels and custom kernel modules for your KVM VPS guest OS. You can set up a VPN server in KVM VPS (PPTP, OpenVPN, IPSec).

What if I need more resources than included into the plan?

Let's know and we'll customize the plan for you.

What’s included into Natcoweb virtual private hosting support services?

Initial server setup, free server monitoring, and site bandwidth statistics

http://www.natcoweb.com/online_support.html
